fulltext:
BUI ANH HUY 
 Front-end Developer 
Phone: (+84) 933 255 110 
Email: anhhhuydayne@gmail.com 
SUMMARY 
I learned Front-end developer at Cybersoft Academy about building web 
application (ReactJS, Angular), with good knowledge of Reactive Programming. 
I am studying at FPT University HCMC for bachelor degree of IT (From 09/2018). 
I love learning new technologies and building valuable application that helps 
others with their work. I’m considered a team-player because I like to help other 
and tend to work well within the group. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 Programming Languages:  
- HTML5, CSS3, SCSS 
- JavaScript, TypeScript 
- Java, OOP 
 Frameworks / Platforms: 
- ReactJS, Angular 
- Redux, RxJS 
- Angular Material, Twitter 
Bootstrap, styled-
component 
-  jQuery 
 Foreign Languages: 
English (listening, reading, 
writing, speaking) 
 Version Control: 
- Git, GitHub, GitLab 
 Soft Skills: 
- Teamwork 
- Technical communication 
- Highly adaptable 
 Others: 
- Good communication skills 
- Can read Document and Requirements fast and efficiently 
- Always has an urge in researching and learning efficient ways to 
approach the problems. 
PERSONAL EXPERIENCE 
May 22 2019 – June 30 2019: 
Project: GTA V ROLEPLAY FIVEM SERVER  
- Position: CTV full-stack game developer 
- Description: This was the first reality project i have done. It used 
mySQL for database and my job was full stack from interact with server 
to client function. It was hard for a fresher like me to do a full-stack job 
with technologies i have never used before (Lua, mySQL, Gitlab). But i 
still try to learn so that from 1 - 2 weeks and then i can work better and 
better to done this project. 
- Technologies Used: Lua, MySQL, Gitlab, HTML5, CSS, Javascript 
- Team Size: 5 
PASTIMES ACTIVITIES 
 I have made some projects about front end web and some stuff that I have 
studied from academy and university ( https://github.com/huydwayne ). 
 I read a lot news and skill from the internet like techtalk.vn and blogger 
toidicodedao so that I have learned some soft skill in programming and 
improve my programming skills. 
 I took part in ACM Contest for 12th grade students whole city and ranked 3. 
 I took part in ACM Contest at my university and ranked 11/30.
